price: Oni ti prebacuju što su primili islam. Reci: “Ne prebacujte mi što ste islam primili; naprotiv, Allah je vama milost podario time što vas je u vjerovanje uputio, ako iskreno govorite.”
arabic: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيۡكَ أَنۡ أَسۡلَمُواْۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّواْ عَلَيَّ إِسۡلَٰمَكُمۖ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَنۡ هَدَىٰكُمۡ لِلۡإِيمَٰنِ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yamunnūna ʿalayka an aslamū qul lā tamunnū ʿalayya is'lāmakum bali al-lahu yamunnu ʿalaykum an hadākum lil'īmāni in kuntum ṣādiqīna
